name: Limitless
title: limitless.ai
shortDescription: Limitless is a wearable AI tool designed to preserve and recall personal conversations and insights. It caters to individuals who value memory enhancement and efficient personal data management. Users can wear the Pendant to capture discussions during meetings, personal reflections, and spontaneous ideas. An example use case includes a professional using Limitless to record key points during client meetings and retrieving them later through an intuitive app.
